questions.text: A 500 gram block is initially stationary on a ramp with an angle of incline of 23°. The coefficient of static friction is 0.44 and the coefficient of kinetic friction is 0.37. Determine the magnitude of frictional force on the block. Choose the best possible answer.
Determine the magnitude of acceleration of the block in the problem above. Chose the best possible answer.
